medium: Cotton, silk; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
description: two-panel huipil; ground is a pattern of thin brown and orange stripes alternating with wider red stripes. Zigzag pattern fils nearly 1/3 of the front and geometric motifs are arranged in rows across the width of the huipil, in  magenta, acqua, blue, purple, white, and yellow. Round neck lined with bright blue ribbon.
creditline: Gift of Roberta and Richard Simmons
